rComments: Professor Trujillo is great! It is so sad to not have him anymore on our campus. I enjoyed his class a LOT! And he made his students feel empowered. His TA sucked... more specifically that Gloria girl. But he was good!

Professor Trujillo is such a nice man!  He is also a really interesting teacher, and he incorporates lots of different things into lecture, like videos, music, and guest speakers.  He really cares about his students and the topic at hand.

Larry is an extremely dedicated and experienced professor.  While his lectures can be a little boring (he says "um" every other word) and he drifts off subject, the material is interesting and he leaves plenty of time for discussion and questions.  TAs are a little overboard though (they are juniors/seniors on power trips).

Larry was one of the best teachers I've had!  He was helpful and he cared so much about his students.  Larry was great but my only problem was my TA.  I'm pretty sure I got an A- instead of an A just because she didn't like me.  But other than that, the class rocked.  It's laid back and easy.

I don't agree with any of these comments. Larry is without a doubt very experienced, but he is definitely overrated and relies too much on his experience to make him a good teacher. I was very disappointed with this class. It was very important material but Larry provided no magic or awe and his TA's suck. They're all undergrads on power trips.

Prof. Trujillo is living proof that people care about your academic success.  He is very concerned with students progress and abilities and wants everyone to do well.  This class was amazing and I had the best time.  Take this class if you can--highley recommended.

I took Chicano Social Changes a couple of years ago, and I loved Professor Trujillo.  He is a very good lecturer, and his texts are interesting.  He is also very approachable, and helpful when it came to papers, and he has good taste in designating t.a.'s
I took his Chicano Social Change class. He just gives 4-5 papers. If you put effort in to this class and you can write, you will get an A.
